NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: Here is the final shipment of ore from the <color=orange>Timber Hearth mines</color> to <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern,</color> Cycad.
2
1
CYCAD: An additional shipment? Now that the construction of the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> and the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> are both complete, why is more ore being delivered?
3 2
COLEUS: I am unsure, but perhaps there are more structures and systems that need to be fortified with the ore than previously thought.
4 3
COLEUS: Whatever the case is, the ore's durability would need to first be improved using the <color=orange>Lava Diving Bell.</color>
5 4
COLEUS: Could you inquire what purpose the <color=orange>Volcanic Testing Site</color> requires the ore while delivering the shipment to <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern,</color> Cycad?
6
5
CYCAD: I would be happy to deliver your questions to the <color=orange>Volcanic Testing Site,</color> Coleus!
7
6
CYCAD: Perhaps they will be kind enough to answer why they have yet to build a warp pad for deliveries to <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern,</color> too..
LV R1 4
LV R2 5
Campsite EX2 2
SY R2 2
